title: Buhner Protocol Starter Package — Susquehanna Sustainable Enterprises
description: 200 capsules of Japanese Knotweed (Fallopia japonica AKA Polygonum cuspidatum) 200 capsules of Cat's Claw (Uncaria tomentosa) 200 capsules of Andrographis (A. paniculata) 2oz bottle of Cordyceps (C. militaris) 2oz bottle of Eleuthero (Eleutherococcus senticosus) tincture 2oz bottle of Gou Teng
cleaned_text: Buhner Protocol Starter Package This package contains 3 bottles of tincture, and 3 bottles of encapsulated herbs based on Stephen Harrod Buhner's herbal protocol. We also offer a tincture expansion option that rounds out this starter kit to include Buhner's complete core protocol. The tincture expansion option, as well as gelatin-based or vegetable-based capsule options are available in the pricing drop-down menu. Basic Starter Package: 200 capsules of Japanese Knotweed (Fallopia japonica AKA Polygonum cuspidatum) 200 capsules of tomentosa) bottle of Gou Teng (Uncaria rhynchophylla) tincture Tincture Expansion also Baikal Skullcap (Scutellaria tincture 2oz bottle of Licorice (Glycyrrhiza spp.) tincture If you do not want one of the tinctures listed above, you may choose to substitute them for 2oz bottles of any of the following tinctures. Please indicate your selection in a note with your order. sylvestris) The plant matter was triple extracted in three different processes using spring water, organic cane alcohol, and organic vegetable glycerin which are then combined. The tincture also contains a tiny pinch of pure sea salt. All of our products are made from organically grown or ethically wildcrafted materials and are made with reverence and love for the Earth and all of her inhabitants. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or ailment. This dietary supplement has not been approved by the FDA. Check out our sister business, Rebel
